sentences.en: Against the viciousness of economy , Webster directed his earliest educational criticism.
sentences.cn: 韦伯最早的对教育方面的批判就是反对校长的低收入.

sentences.en: An executable examining project and method of cleaning viciousness code are presented.
sentences.cn: 对于恶意代码提出了可实施的检测系统方案和删除的方法.

sentences.en: Gossip Girl  reversed course and found a way saucily to make a virtue of vacuity and viciousness.
sentences.cn: “绯闻女孩”颠倒是非，用另一种方式填补你的空虚和小邪恶。

sentences.en: His viciousness is beyond our conception.
sentences.cn: 他的狠毒非我们所能想像.

sentences.en: She seemed the personification of all the female highhandedness and viciousness he had experienced.
sentences.cn: 所以祥子就更怕她,仿佛她身上带着他所尝受过的一切女性的厉害与毒恶.

words.tran_cn: 恶毒的；恶意的；堕落的；有错误的；品性不端的；剧烈的
